name: Battle Fury
description: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

abilities.name: Chop Tree
notes: Does not share cooldown with Chop Tree from other sources

abilities.name: Quell
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack damage against non-hero units.
notes: Quell is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus
The attack damage bonus adapts immediately depending on the wielder's range type
Stacks with the Quell of Quelling Blade, but not with additional Battle Furies
Does not work against Buildings, Ward-type units, Illusions, Spirit Bear, Couriers, or Allied units

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deals a percentage of the wielder's attack damage as physical damage in a cone in front of the wielder on each attack.
notes: Grants cleave if the affected hero's range type is melee
Visual effects and sounds still play when illusions attack
Does not proc cleave when attacking ally units
Neither proc nor damage Buildings or Ward-type units

additionalInfo: Purchasable at the Base Shop, under Weapons
Requires items from the Secret Shop to be completed
